Bayesian Histogram Comparison

Implementation of a Bayesian approach to the comparison of two histograms, providing the results from both model comparison as well as a mixture model. Both approaches admit histograms generated from independent events as well as importance samping, allowing for the comparison of histograms generated from data or simulation.

A ROOT (http://root.cern.ch/drupal/) installation is required.
